name: a5_celltoboundary
title: A5 Cell to Boundary
description: Returns the vertices that define the boundary of an A5 cell

inputs.name: input_table
inputs.title: Input table
inputs.description: The table containing A5 cell identifiers

inputs.name: cell_column
inputs.title: Cell column
inputs.description: The column containing A5 cell identifiers

inputs.name: output_column_name
inputs.title: Output column name
inputs.description: Name for the output boundary coordinates column

outputs.name: output_table
outputs.title: Output table
outputs.description: The table with A5 cell boundary coordinates column added
